viewTemplate.description: An object describing the type's view.

attributionURL.description: Gets or sets the attribution URL for the current browser session.

engagementTelemetry.description: Enables or disables the engagement telemetry for the current browser session.

extensionTimeout.description: Sets the amount of time in ms that extensions have to return results to the browser.urlbar API.

events.name: onViewUpdateRequested
events.description: Fired when the urlbar view updates the view of one of the results of the provider.

parameters.name: idsByName
parameters.description: A Map from an element's name, as defined by the provider; to its ID in the DOM, as defined by the browser.

extraParameters.name: providerName
extraParameters.description: The name of the provider you want to provide updates for.

returns.description: An object describing the view update.

functions.name: addDynamicResultType
functions.description: Adds a dynamic result type. See UrlbarResult.addDynamicResultType().

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the result type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The result type. Currently this should be an empty object (which is the default value).

functions.name: addDynamicViewTemplate
functions.description: Adds a view template for a dynamic result type. See UrlbarView.addDynamicViewTemplate().

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The view template will be registered for the dynamic result type with this name.

functions.name: clearInput
functions.description: Sets urlbar.value to the empty string and the pageproxystate to invalid.
